author: @ianmcshea913
text: When people ask me if I believe Israel has the "right to exist", I just ask them if they believe settler colonies have the right to exist.

author: @lisakukla459
text:
I think Beau needs to have you on when he gets back to doing interviews. That would probably blow your channel up huge. I'll tweet him; Hopefully other folks will too, and we'll make it happen. 

Also, are you familiar with RM Brown? You guys are very different, but I think it could be an interesting conversation. He goes live every Monday and Wednesday and takes calls. Sometimes Vadim calls in and that's always a great time. Maybe you could too?
